description: Contact your local council to find out who issues disabled bus passes in your area as part of the English National Concessionary Travel Scheme

details.introduction: Contact your local council to find out who issues disabled bus passes in your area as part of the English National Concessionary Travel Scheme. You’re eligible for a disabled person’s pass if you live in England and are ‘eligible disabled’.
details.more_information:
Get more information about a disabled person’s bus pass in:

  • Scotland
  • Wales
  • Northern Ireland
